row.process:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC.PRV.VARA.TEMP.PP_RETRIEVE_PROPERTY_ENTRY.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :IF &UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_NAME# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :ENDIF
:SET &result# = ""
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Properties-Result: ")
: IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 19 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &result# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &len# = STR_LENGTH(&result#)
: IF &UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_NAME# = "" : SET &keyPos# = STR_FIND(&result#, "=") : IF &keyPos# > 0 : SET &keyPos# = &keyPos# - 1 : SET &keyLine# = MID(&result#,1,&keyPos#) : SET &key# = STR_TRIM(&keyLine#)
: SET &keyPos# = &keyPos# + 2 : IF &keyPos# > &len# : SET &value# = "" : ELSE : SET &valueLine# = MID(&result#,&keyPos#) : SET &value# = STR_TRIM(&valueLine#) : ENDIF : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&key#", "&value#" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:IF &UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_NAME# <> "" : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_VALUE# = &result# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_ALL_VARS# = &variableName# :ENDIF
